channel.title: KTVZ - NewsChannel 21 | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/KTVZ21/

item.title: Here are NewsChannel 21's Sunrise Birthdays for Thursday, Au
item.description: Here are NewsChannel 21's Sunrise Birthdays for Thursday, August 29th. Happy Birthday! You can see more recent entries and submit an upcoming birthday to air at: https://ktvz.com/share/sunrise-birthdays/ . It's under the Contests tab on KTVZ.COM.

item.title: A hearing today is set to determine whether the trial of Bry
item.description: A hearing today is set to determine whether the trial of Bryan Kohberger, the man accused of killing four University of Idaho students in 2022, will be moved out of Latah County, a location his attorneys argued would be unable to provide an unbiased jury for the long-awaited trial.

item.title: The FBI has continued to mishandle allegations of child sexu
item.description: The FBI has continued to mishandle allegations of child sexual abuse in the years after the bureau’s notorious bungling of the investigation into disgraced USA Gymnastics doctor Larry Nassar, according to an audit by the Justice Department’s inspector general released today.
